Android prevents changing camera or microphone privacy while locked. For this reason, camera and microphone ignore custom lock/unlock delays and trigger immediately (if they are not in use).

To ensure automatic disabling on lock:

1. Go to Settings → Security → Screen Lock
2. Tap the gear icon ⚙️ next to your lock method
3. Set "Automatically lock" to 5 seconds or more
4. Disable "Power button instantly locks" (if present)
Enabling Airplane Mode will disable WiFi, Bluetooth, Mobile Data, and NFC regardless of their individual settings.\n\nUse this for maximum privacy when the device is locked.

Battery Saver reduces background activity and may limit some app features.

It does not directly disable radios (WiFi, Bluetooth, etc.) but can affect sync, location accuracy, and background processing.

Useful for extending battery life when locked for long periods.
Free, open source, no ads, for your privacy.\nConsider donating to support ongoing development.
